HighlightHighlight.summary:
The Highlight() constructor returns a newly created
object which can hold a collection of objects to be styled using the {{domxref("css_custom_highlight_api", "CSS Custom Highlight API", "", "nocode")}}.

remarks.para:
-{{domxref("css_custom_highlight_api", "The CSS Custom Highlight API", "", "nocode")}}
-CSS Custom Highlight API: The Future of Highlighting Text Ranges on the Web
